name: Shoppalive Limited
description: Developer of a digital supermarket application designed to support women in starting a business. The company engages in the asset-light retail network using digital tools and community leaders to bring quality, assortment, and pricing at par, enabling female micro-entrepreneurs to bring greater selection and affordable products to underserved communities.
one_liner: Developer of a digital supermarket application designed to support women in starting a business. The company engages in the asset-light retail network using digital tools and community leaders to bring quality, assortment, and pricing at par, enabling female micro-entrepreneurs to bring greater selection and affordable products to underserved communities.
